input_text:
Job Title: Solutions Sales Consultant

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology, Sales

Description:
About the role:Medisolv is seeking a high energy and extremely motivated Healthcare Information Technology Sales Solutions Consultant to support the company’s sales efforts. The company is uniquely positioned for rapid growth in quality management and value-based care and is growing the direct sales team to help capitalize on growth potential.
As a Sales Solutions Consultant at Medisolv, you will have the opportunity to play an integral role in the expansion of our business by providing solution expertise to current and prospective clients during the sales process. Key activities include performing solution and platform level demonstrations, leading scripted demonstrations, participating in tradeshows, supporting business development initiatives, assisting with sales proposal development, staying current on solution roadmap new releases and key features, and maintaining the presentation database.
Responsibilities: solution expertise to current and prospective clients during the sales process, working collaboratively with the team of Sales Executives.solution and platform-level demonstrations, providing product-level expertise and addressing questions from prospective clients and partners.understanding of clients’ requirements and assist in building out strategy and value proposition to address clients’ need through the company’s solutions, capabilities and services.marketing team by providing solution videos, photos, and materials for promotional campaigns.with internal product management, engineering, and client services teams to stay current on solution roadmaps, new releases and key features, and best practices for implementation and services.the presentation database and perform regular updates to content/build necessary to deliver thorough demonstrations and support any scripted presentations.an understanding of strategic selling and complex sales process.the sales team in achieving agreed-upon sales goals.participate in professional trade shows, associations, and other events to generate new business.and build relationships with Medisolv business partners and other organizations.the company’s CRM system for documenting relevant updates.regular feedback from the field regarding competitive intelligence and considerations for platform/solution enhancements.participate as a member of the sales and marketing departments in supporting development of new tools, strategies, plans, etc. for growing top line.a deep understanding of the company’s solutions and their unique value proposition for clients.internal projects or growth-related initiatives, as needed.
Required Qualifications: degree or associate degree with equivalent experience.of 10 years of progressive experience in the healthcare information technology industry.communication and presentation skills of product features and key functionality with attention to detail. Current experience presenting healthcare technology products and solutions to C-level executives and other senior executives within hospitals and health system market or large-scale ambulatory market.Experience can be in professional services/consulting, product management, direct sales, or sales support roles.knowledge of quality management, and/or advanced analytics solutions.independent and resourceful self-starter with highly motivated demeanor.strong sense of personal accountability to drive business results and exceed expectations.to establish strong team relationships and thrive in a highly collaborative environment.a remote position with travel to support tradeshows and industry events, with occasional on-site client meetings and internal company meetings. (Ability to travel approximately 25%.)with Microsoft 365 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, etc.), CRM solutions (HubSpot), video conferencing/presentation solutions (Zoom, Teams, GoToMeeting, etc.).completion of a pre-employment background checkbe legally authorized to work in the United States for any employer. We are unable to provide sponsorship at this time.
Preferred Qualifications: knowledge of CMS quality reporting regulations and requirements.Nursing background or equivalent experience.with HCIT solutions delivered in a hosted or SaaS deployment model, including high-level technical architecture.with data science and business intelligence.
This position is open to remote work. Our office is located in Columbia, Maryland.
Who are we?Medisolv helps healthcare organizations improve patient care by providing the data they need to evaluate their organizations’ performance. Medisolv developed a healthcare quality management platform that gathers data from an organization’s EHR which is used to calculate measure performance. We pair our software with award-winning support to organizations attempting to navigate the complex field of regulatory reporting.
Medisolv's clients include over 1,600 hospitals & 6,000 providers. We’ve supported our clients for nearly 25 years & were the first in the field of electronic measurement for many seminal federal requirements. Our advisors dissect federal rulings to ensure hospitals & clinics are correctly meeting their requirements. Medisolv then submits this data to governing bodies.
We are a Great Place to Work® Certified company. With us, you can expect an environment where employees feel motivated, challenged, and encouraged. Our office is located in Columbia, MD and have employees working remotely in 33 states. Our team understands work life balance and that we have a life beyond our desks. At Medisolv, we work with passion, excellence, integrity and innovation.
What we offer:Medical, dental and vision insuranceEmployer paid group life insuranceEmployer paid long term disability401k with company matchFSA and HSAFlexible work schedulesPaid time off and holidaysPaid parental leaveAnnual in person & virtual team-building eventsEmployee recognition awardsAnnual performance review and merit increase
Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with DisabilitiesThe contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractor’s legal duty to furnish information. 41 CFR 60-1.35(c)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Solutions Sales Consultant
output_json.summary: Medisolv seeks a Sales Solutions Consultant to support sales efforts in healthcare information technology.
job_responsibilities: Provide solution expertise to current and prospective clients during the sales process
Address questions from prospective clients and partners
Understand clients' requirements and assist in building out strategy and value proposition
Support marketing team with solution videos, photos, and materials
Stay current on solution roadmap new releases and key features
Participate in professional trade shows, associations, and other events
Build relationships with business partners and organizations
Document relevant updates in company's CRM system
Contribute to the sales team in achieving sales goals
Participate in developing new tools, strategies, plans, etc.
benefits: Annual in-person and virtual team-building events
Annual performance review and merit increase
output_json.company_information: Medisolv provides healthcare organizations with a platform to improve patient care by gathering data from EHRs for performance evaluation. They offer award-winning support for regulatory reporting compliance.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities
